sourcesContent:
<template>
  <skill-bar
    @update-page="getNewPage"
  ></skill-bar>
  <main-content
    :skill-name="selectedPage"
    :is-visble="isVisble"
    @="getNewState"
  ></main-content>
  <base-help-page
    :is-visble="isVisble"
  ></base-help-page>
</template>

<script>
import mainContent from './mainContent.vue';
import skillBar from './skillBar.vue';
// import { reactive } from 'vue';
import BaseHelpPage from './components/layout/baseHelpPage.vue';
export default {
  components: { skillBar, mainContent, BaseHelpPage },
  // setup(){
  //   let sharedData = reactive({helpPage: false});
  //   return {
  //       sharedData,
  //   }
  // },
  // provide(){
  //   return{
  //       isShow: this.sharedData.helpPage,
  //   }
  // },
  data(){
    return {
      selectedPage:'伐木',
      isVisble:true,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getNewPage(newPage){
      this.selectedPage=newPage.name;
    },
    getNewState(newState){
      this.isVisble = newState;
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style>
 html, body{
    display: flex;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: white;
    font-weight: 900;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    padding:0;
 }

 #app {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
 }



</style>
